traits.Aggressive: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
traits.Magic Resistance: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The tanarukk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its greatsword.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Greatsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
